Unnamed: 0.1: To provide transparency for all our stakeholders, we measure and report on a range of environmental, social and governance metrics. All metrics capture data of the wholly owned and operated entities of the Group, associates and joint ventures unless otherwise stated. PwC has provided limited assurance on these metrics (pages 40-46 of the 2023 Annual Report) for the year ended 30 June 2023, unless otherwise indicated. \nThe PwC Limited Assurance Report is available on pages 47-49 of the 2023 Annual Report.
